attributes.action: Refuse Free movement for EU nationals from any negotiations with the EU
attributes.additional_details:
We request that, any informal or formal negotiations with the European Union must state that we will not accept free movement of labour rules under any circumstances and that an Australian Point-Based system will now be used so that we offer a fair and reason system, in which skilled workers such as Doctors, Nurses, Tradesmen have the right to live and work in the UK on the same terms as those from European countries, But also any other country around the world. 

http://ec.europa.eu/social/main.jsp?catId=457
attributes.background:
On June 23rd, The UK voted to Leave the EU. One of the most important factors in this referendum was Immigration. 

I will use this petition to advise the Government that the will of the people will be heard and that, we will no longer settle for the European Union Free Movement of Labour.
